google_tools module¶

Created on Mon Jul 11 09:32:31 2022

@author: books

google_tools.parse_google_record(record)¶

Removes unnecessary key/values from record and returns a dictionary with only necessary key/values.

Parameters

record (dict) – dictionary representing a book

Returns

dictionary with only necessary key/values

Return type

dict

google_tools.search_google_books(author=None, isbn=None, title=None, num_results=1, language='en', verbose=False)¶

Searches for book information from the Google Books API. Information is first retreived in JSON format, and then parsed to a list of dictionaries.

Parameters

  • author (str) – Part of author name (first and/or last)

  • isbn (str or int) – ISBN10 or ISBN13

  • title (str) – Part of the book title

  • num_results (int) – Number of results to be returned

  • language (str) – String of the 2-character laguage code for the desired language

books-catalog
